text: sæbævinma allāh (tritvaya hevat piyāṇan , putrayāṇan , śuddhātmayāṇan yana) tidenāgen keneki yæyi pævasū aya da pratikṣēpakayin bavaṭa pat vūha. ekama deviyan (allāh) hæra venat deviyeku nomæta. ovun pavasana dæyin novæḷakuṇē nam ovun aturin pratikṣēpa kaḷavunaṭa vēdanīya dan̆ḍuvamak niyata vaśayenma sparśa vanu æta
